name: RetrOrienteering
description:
RetrOrienteering

Created in 32 Hours for PTBO Game Jam 03!

RetrOrienteering is a dungeon crawler where new visitors to the dungeon profit from late adventurers by copying from the maps found on their corpses.

By esarkis

Ceiling, Wall, and Floor textures by Rick Dolishny

This game utilizes CC0 Audio and Visual assets.
